title: Ep. 27 - Why Ludwig's Mom Hates Nick
description: Tally ho, Gamers. Nick returns from having the gross thing for another episode of YARD TIME. The boys exchange Christmas gifts, Nick recounts his time in his room for 12 days straight, and Ludwig gets completely owned by a pilot.
